      • setupTestConfig

        public static void setupTestConfig()
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Any test that calls ConfigurationFactory anywhere must call this in @Before. Note: if you don't, even if the property you require is set in the default properties file in the classpath, you will break the other tests, as the test properties file below will never be loaded.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
